workflows.name: Indicator (Type Domain) - Get Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of indicators of type ‘Domain’ using configured threat intelligence tools.

step_variables.foundAVReputation: {{ ( vars.result.data.results and vars.result.data.results | json_query("[*].tags[]")  | length > 0 ) | ternary(true,false) }}

conditions.condition: {{ 'tenant' in vars.input.records[0] and vars.input.records[0].tenant.isDedicated and vars.input.records[0].tenant.role != 'self' }}

step_variables.temp: {% if vars.result.data.attributes.whois.raw %}{%- for item in vars.result.data.attributes.whois.raw[0].split("\n") -%}{%- set key = item.split(":")[0] -%}{%- set value = item.split(":")[1:] | join("") -%}{%if value and key%}{{vars.whoisdata_dict.update({key:value})}}{%endif%}{%- endfor -%}{%endif%}

params.value:
{% if vars.foundAVReputation %}

AlienVault OTX Summary

Tags
{{(vars.steps.Get_Reputation_from_AlienVault_OTX.data.results | json_query("[*].tags[]") | unique | string).replace("[","").replace("]","")}}

{% endif %}

steps.name: Start
steps.description: Indicator reputation is set as 'TBD' by 'Create and Link Indicator' utility playbook. We can ignore those indicators when triggering this PB

routes.name: Geo Locate Domain -> Compute IP Stack Summary
Get File Reputation from Anomali -> Compute Anomali Summary
Configuration -> Get Domain Reputation from MxToolbox
Compute VT Categories -> Compute DNS Records
Compute Fortinet Web Filter Summary -> Is Malicious
Compute DNS Records -> Compute VT Whois
Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX -> Copy  of Compute IP Stack Summary
Compute IP Stack Summary -> Is Malicious
Configuration -> Get Domain Reputation from Fortinet Web Filter
Get Domain Reputation from VT -> Whois Information
Get Reputation from URLVoid -> Compute URLVoid Summary
Configuration -> Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX
Configuration -> Get File Reputation from Anomali
Get Domain Reputation from MxToolbox -> Compute MxToolbox Summary
Get Domain Reputation from Fortinet Web Filter -> Compute Fortinet Web Filter Summary
Copy  of Compute VT Summary -> Is Malicious
Compute AV OTX Summary -> Is Malicious
